ePujas.title: Krishna Janmashtami Puja – Divine Celebration at Your Doorstep
ePujas.subtitle: Celebrate the birth of Lord Krishna with authentic Vedic rituals, experienced pandits, and complete samagri.

benefits.heading: Benefits of Krishna Janmashtami Puja
points: Brings happiness, peace, and prosperity in the family
Removes negativity and obstacles from life
Ensures blessings of Lord Krishna for good health and success
Strengthens love, devotion, and family bonding
Fulfills desires and attracts divine grace

packages.title: Basic Puja
packages.description: Simple Krishna Janmashtami puja with samagri included.

packages.title: Standard Puja
packages.description: Extended puja with bhajan kirtan and additional rituals.

packages.title: Premium Puja
packages.description: Full-scale Janmashtami puja with Jhula utsav & group bhajan.
features: Full samagri with decorated Krishna idol

templeDetails.heading: Our Association with Braj Temples
templeDetails.description: Our pandits are connected with famous Braj temples like Banke Bihari Ji (Vrindavan), ISKCON Temple (Mathura), Radha Raman Mandir, and others. This ensures authentic rituals as per the Vaishnav tradition.
highlights: Live Darshan arrangements on request
Prasad delivery from temples (available in Premium package)
Direct blessings from Braj Dham

whyChooseUs.heading: Why Book with Braj Pandit?
points: Experienced Braj-based Pandits
Authentic Krishna Janmashtami Rituals
Online & Doorstep Puja Facility
Transparent Pricing & No Hidden Charges
Spiritual Satisfaction Guaranteed

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.message: We booked a Janmashtami puja with Braj Pandit. The pandit ji was very knowledgeable and performed the rituals beautifully.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Verma
testimonials.message: The Jhula utsav was mesmerizing. Our family felt divine blessings throughout the day.

ctaSection.text: Book Your Krishna Janmashtami Puja Today & Invite Lord Krishna’s Blessings!

faq.question: Is samagri included in the package?
faq.answer: Yes, all puja essentials are included.

faq.question: Can I book for my office/company?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide special corporate puja packages.

faq.question: Will Prasad be delivered?
faq.answer: Yes, Prasad is included as per the selected package.

faq.question: Can I reschedule the puja?
faq.answer: Yes, you can reschedule up to 24 hours before the event.
